data.comment: Today's referee, Takuto Okabe, has blown to start the match.
Tokyo's Kensuke Nagai is whistled for offside at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Shonan's Naoki Ishihara is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 5, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Tokyo drives forward and Takumi Nakamura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Takumi Nakamura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tokyo.
Takuto Okabe signals a Tokyo throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 15, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 20, Kazunari Ono (Shonan) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tokyo defenders.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tokyo to check on Akihiro Hayashi, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 27, Shonan are pushing forward but Yuto Iwasaki's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Takuto Okabe signals a Tokyo throw-in in Shonan's half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Tokyo surge into the attack at Ajinomoto Stadium but Diego Oliveira’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Shonan at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 32, Shonan have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Tokyo.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 34, Takumi Nakamura (Tokyo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Takuto Okabe awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Akihiro Hayashi has recovered and rejoins the match in Tokyo.
Takuto Okabe awards the home team a throw-in.
Hirotaka Mita (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 37, Kensuke Nagai of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Kensuke Nagai puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Takuto Okabe blows against Tokyo's Leandro for offside.
In the minute 44, Tokyo's Hirotaka Mita gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Takuto Okabe will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick Tokyo.
Temma Matsuda is replacing Mitsuki Saito for the away team.
In the minute 46, Tarik Elyounoussi is replacing Yuto Iwasaki for Shonan at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Tarik Elyounoussi for Shonan drives towards goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 56, Tokyo have a goal kick.
In Tokyo Tokyo drive forward through Leandro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Keisuke Saka (Shonan) has received a yellow card from Takuto Okabe.
Takuto Okabe waits before resuming play because Akihiro Hayashi for Tokyo is still down.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Akihiro Hayashi returns to the field for Tokyo after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 61, Tokyo’s Akihiro Hayashi is on his feet again at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 61, The match at Ajinomoto Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Akihiro Hayashi, who is down injured.
Tokyo's Leandro breaks free at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a first substitution, with Hotaka Nakamura replacing Takumi Nakamura.
Arthur Silva is on a sub for Hirotaka Mita for Tokyo.
In the minute 64, Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Goal kick for Shonan at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 66, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Attention is being given to Tokyo’s Akihiro Hayashi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 70, Tokyo's Akihiro Hayashi is back in action after a slight knock.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Shonan.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Temma Matsuda is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 73, In Tokyo, Diego Oliveira of Tokyo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tokyo's Arthur Silva gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Shonan.
Takuto Okabe awards Shonan a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, Tokyo make their third substitution with Adailton replacing Kensuke Nagai.
Takuto Okabe awards the away team a throw-in.
Tokyo pushes forward through Leandro, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Takuto Okabe signals a Shonan throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shonan.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Tokyo extend their lead to 2-0 through Diego Oliveira.
Great play from Leandro to set up the goal.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Shota Kobayashi is on a sub for Takuya Okamoto for Shonan.
The away team replace Naoki Yamada with Hiroshi Ibusuki.
In the minute 87, The home team replace Diego Oliveira with Taichi Hara.
Leandro of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Takuto Okabe awards Shonan a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
Shonan drive upfield and Hiroshi Ibusuki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Takuto Okabe signals a free kick to Shonan.
Shonan's Kazuaki Mawatari is on target but unsuccessful.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Takuto Okabe.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
It's now 3-0 in Tokyo as Taichi Hara scores for Tokyo.
Leandro instrumental with a fine assist.
